title: salvataggio password accesso Thunderbird
content:

title: mail with no text and attachments
content:
Hi in one of our accounts we have created on pc folders where we move important emails sorted for customers, suppliers, banks and so on from around 3 days we checked these email and we found in these folders email with only subject text and no main text and no attachments the emails disappeared are between november 2024 and november 2023 but I repeat only in our folders; in the main inbox mail is all regular

thank you for your help

David
creator: MECARTinfo
